fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to fight. You lose the fight and die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If 3 other players visit the player you're Fighting, the power of attention lets you win the fight and deal an attack to your target instead of getting yourself killed.
- You appear suspicious on nights you don't fight anyone. (It just looks like you're hankering for a fight.)
